topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body: I think what makes this Kingpin interesting is the sheer sincerity in his intentions and actions. Where every other version of the Kingpin has always been evil to an almost cartoonish degree, this one actually BELIEVES what he's doing is right. You can tell that he believes it too. He believes that by doing all this horrible shit he is making the city better. And his actions aren't just a cover for his sheer ego. Hell his almost lack of ego puts him above any other Kingpin adaptation to date.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
